This_app_is_brought_to_you_by_Nimiq: This app is brought to you by Nimiq, only places that are verified by Google are accepted for this map.
Report_an_issue_with_an_establishment: Report an issue with an establishment
Thank_you_for_reporting_this_issue: Thank you for reporting this issue
Thank_you_for_submitting_a_new_establish: Thank you for submitting a new establishment to the Crypto Map!
This_may_take_a_few_days_to_process: This may take a few days to process. Keep an eye out for changes to the establishment in the Crypto Map.
There_has_been_a_problem_on_our_side: There has been a problem on our side.
More_cryptocurrencies_supported_in_the_f: More cryptocurrencies supported in the future
Add_a_place_to_the_Crypto_Map: Add an establishment to the Crypto Map
You_can_add_any_place_that_has_a_Google_: You can add any establishment that has a Google Business Profile.
Type_the_name: Type the name of the establishment
A_Crypto_ATM_is_a_machine_that_allows_cu: A Crypto ATM is a machine that allows customers to buy or sell popular cryptocurrencies using traditional fiat currencies like the Euro or US Dollar.
A_mobile_app_for_paying_with_NIM_at_Blue: A mobile app for paying with NIM at Bluecode acceptance locations.
Enter_country_city_or_zip_code: Enter country, city or zip code to discover locations that accept Bitcoin, Nimiq and other crypto-currencies.

kurant.tooltip: Kurant ATM is a blockchain-based ATM network and platform.

gocrypto.tooltip: GoCrypto is a global payment network that enables merchants to accept crypto payments.
